TopicTitle: If when I switched to Docking...

Articles.Content:
The Navball changed into a system like NavyFish's Docking Port Alignment Indicator.

Then I could dock from any view with a Navball especially IVA!

That would be really nice.

Actually, all that is really needed for that is a camera or port view such as what the Apollo and Space Shuttle astronauts have. The Clamp-O-Tron Shielded Docking Port already comes with the target rod for that. Just requires a third view beyond IVA that comes with each docking port and the claw(Advanced Grabbing Unit).
